title: Gifting Notifications
body: Hey, so since roughly Christmas, every time that I log onto League I receive every gifting notification that's been sent to me in the past 6 months (aka every time I log on I get "X opened his gift!" even though I haven't sent him a gift since Christmas). I believe this started when gifting notifications were turned on on the new client and I figured I would just ignore it until the client came out of beta, but alas, here I am however many months later and I still get notified about my Blitzcrank icon every time I log on. If a friendly neighborhood Rioter could swoop in and unplug a couple wires or whatever it takes to fix this, that would be super. If not, I guess I'll just consider it a parade of trophies every time I log on.

replies.body: Typically those notifications will keep popping up unless you hit the little 'x' in the upper right-hand corner of the notification window itself. Make sure you're hitting that when it pops up. If you *are* hitting that 'x'. go ahead and hit me back up and I can do some digging and see what we could do to stop that!
